title: multi_measure_percent_with_toggleN
description: Used for measures with percent operation with an option to have toggleN option in transpose report type.

header_literal.description: Sub header literal to be displayed below the parent header on the UI for percent value.

n_header_literal.description: Sub header literal to be displayed below the parent header on the UI for n value.

display_order.description: The order in which this header has to be displayed on the UI.

header_id.description: The app managed unique id within the DomainHeaders entry.

mouseover_literal.description: The literal to be used for mouseover.

append_literal.description: The literal to be used for appending to mouseover/csv literal for the header.

n_append_literal.description: The literal to be used for appending for n column.

csv_header_literal.description: The literal to be used for csv extracts for percent columns.

parent_header_id.description: The header of the parent header.
